dt: {bc}sexual activity involving such practices as the use of physical restraints, the granting and relinquishing of control, and the infliction of pain

dt.t: He provided a vivid insight into the life of a dedicated follower of bondage, discipline, sadism and masochism ({wi}BDSM{/wi}) as he gave evidence to his trial at Guildford Crown Court.
{wi}BDSM{/wi} refers to a range of sexual preferences that generally relate to enjoyment of physical control, psychological control, and/or pain.

Whatever one thinks of {wi}BDSM{/wi}, given the pain and intensity associated with it, it certainly doesn't come across as a stress-reducing activity—to most outsiders, there wouldn't appear to be anything relaxing about whips and handcuffs.

{wi}BDSM{/wi} communities have been quick to distance themselves from {it}Fifty Shades{/it}, and, indeed, from any beliefs or behaviours incompatible with informed, enthusiastic and uncoerced consent.

et: The {it}d{/it} and {it}s{/it} have also been taken to stand for {it}dominance{/it} and {it}submission.{/it}
shortdef: sexual activity involving such practices as the use of physical restraints, the granting and relinquishing of control, and the infliction of pain
